page.title: 07AGRICULTURE IN EPPING GREEN
page.content: THE AREA IS PREDOMINANTLY RURAL.A DETAILED SURVEY AND CHECKING ON THE ORDANANCE SURVEY MAP CONFIRMS THAT BETWEEN 65% AND 75% OF THE LAND IS USED FOR AGRICULTURE.THE SURVEY REVEALED LARGE AREAS BEING USED FOR CEREAL CULIVATION AND GRASS FOR SILAGE.THE SURVEY ALSO REPORTED A VERY SMALL NUMBER OF CATTLE AND LIVESTOCK.THE MAJOR TYPE OF FARMING IS ARABLE.INFACT THE TERRAIN LENDS ITSELF ADMIRABLY TO ARABLE FARMING,BEING MAINLY LOW ROLLING HEATHLAND.A SMALL PERCENTAGE OF THE LAND IS USED FOR OTHER CROPS,MAINLY THE CONTROVERSIAL GROWING OF RAPE SEED FOR OIL.BECAUSE ARABLE FARMING IS NOT LABOUR INTENSIVE VERY FEW OF THE LOCAL PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED IN FARMING.
